intro.dialog: I see you still scurrying around, chasin' monsters all over the forest.
Why don't ya take a little break and play a game of |C3|Stargems|C0| with me?

to_cave.dialog: I set up the game in this snug little cave over here.

to_cave_twins.dialog: I set up the game in this cozy cave over here.
It looks like there's not much room for all of us in here.
That's okay though. I think I'll go for a little walk while you two play.
Looks like it's just me n' you, darling.

explain_game.dialog: The game is pretty simple.
Ya get a deck of 24 cards in 12 pairs, and each round I'm gunna give you half of 'em.
All you gotta do is flip them over and try to match 'em.
After every 3 matches, I'll replace those cards with 3 more pairs from your deck.
Ya get 30 flips to make as many matches as ya can, darling!
Every card match will give ya some |C3|stardust points!|C0|
They give ya different amounts of stardust dependin' on how many little points the star has.
Like this star right here has 4 points, so matching it gives ya 4 points.
This star has 5 points, so it gives ya 5 points.|L|Easy, right?
But here's where it gets real good.
Somma your cards got these little bonuses on 'em.
These cards will double or triple their own score!
But these ones multiply the score of your NEXT card match!
And these cards will add stardust to your NEXT TWO card matches.
These get added before any multipliers too!
So now ya gotta consider what order you wanna match your cards.
Don't just match 'em all as soon as you know where they are.
You gotta plan a chain, darling.
If ya match these 3 cards in this order, you're gunna get a whole lotta stardust!
But you still gotta remember that ya got limited flips before the round ends.
It gets even more interesting between rounds, but you'll figure it out when we get there.
Oh, one more thing-
Just |C3|press |B7||C0| on any revealed card and I'll tell ya what it does if ya can't remember.

to_first_round.dialog: Let's get right to it then, darling!
Here's your first round of cards.

sg_main_star: This star is always worth 25% of the stardust ya got in the round so far!
sg_main_copy: This card copies the last one ya matched!|L||C4|It only gives ya 2 stardust if ya got no matches yet though.|C0|
sg_main_add: This card adds |C3|+[VAL1] stardust|C0| to all matches for the rest of the round!
sg_main_reveal: This star is only worth 1 stardust, but it'll activate and |C3|reveal random cards [VAL1] times!|C0|
sg_bonus_add: and it adds |C3|+[VAL1] stardust|C0| to the next 2 matches.
sg_bonus_x2: and it gives your next match |C3|double stardust!|C0|
sg_bonus_x3: and it gives your next match |C3|triple stardust!|C0|
sg_bonus_reveal1: and it also |C3|reveals a random card.|C0|

comment_stargems_round_end.dialog: That's all for this round, darling.

round_end_no_level.dialog: You didn't get enough stardust to go up a level this time.
But there's always next round, darling.

round_end_level_up.dialog: Ya went up a whole stardust level this round!

round_end_multi_level.dialog: Ya went up by [VAL1] whole stardust levels, darling!

round_end_times_up.dialog: That's all the rounds we got time for today, darling.
Ya made it all the way up to stardust level [VAL2]!

round_end_max_level.dialog: Ya made a pile of stardust even taller than I am!
|wave|I think you won the game, darling.

to_card_trade_first.dialog: Now I'm gunna pull out some random cards, and you can trade 'em for ones you got in your deck.

to_card_trade.dialog_rand2: Let's see whatcha get this time.

comment_choose_swap.dialog: Pick the card ya wanna swap for it.

comment_choose_done.dialog: Touch this card when you're all done tradin'.

to_gift.dialog: Before you go, I got some gifts for ya!

to_another_gift.dialog: That suits you so well, darling.

to_last_gift.dialog: I'm glad ya like it, darling.
I wantcha to take one more.

to_the_end.dialog: Look at that big ol' smile it put on your face.

sleep_response.dialog: You can sleep right here next to me, darling.
Far as I'm concerned, you're my new guard zone 'til you wake up.

leave_blank.dialog: Your flower crown is so pretty.|L|I love it!

leave_blank.dialog_rand1: Darling, you got me happier than an avioc findin' a fresh batch of sweet fruits.
leave_blank.dialog_rand2: Darling, you got me feelin' like a day bloom in the sunshine after 2 weeks of rain.
leave_blank.dialog_rand3: Darling, you got me feelin' like a night bloom on the night of the three full moons.
leave_blank.dialog_rand4: Darling, if I were a glyph, you'd be drownin' in heart stones right about now.
leave_blank.dialog_rand5: Darling, don't make me have to pick you up and squeeze ya 'til all your cute rubs off on me.

leave_blank.dialog: You just love gettin' a reaction outta me, don't ya?

leave_defect.dialog: I was wondering,    how can you see anything without any eyes?
I don't need eyes to see, darling.
There are so many other ways to see.
Oh... I never thought about that.

leave_twins.dialog: I really could have used your help.
You have to learn to do this yourself sometimes.
Are we still talking about the game?

leave_devil.dialog: Darling, your crown is simply magnificent.
It makes you look so powerful.
I knew you would understand the importance of looking powerful.
Your crown gives you such a dominating presence.
Darling, keep talkin' like that, and I'll just have to keep ya here with me forever.

leave_default.dialog: I hope ya enjoyed playin' some Stargems with me, darling.
